title: Watch live: Pelosi holds press conference
text:
Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) is holding her weekly news conference on Capitol Hill on Thursday morning.

Pelosi will take questions from reporters following the death of Rep. Elijah Cummings (D-Md). Cummings chaired the powerful House Oversight and Reform Committee, one of the three committees leading the impeachment inquiry into President Trump.

The press conference also comes one day after a contentious meeting with Trump at the White House on Turkey, after which she and the president exchanged barbs accusing one another of "meltdowns."

Watch the press conference live in the video above.
